official_title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to eliminate the upper age limitation of 70 years of age established in section 12(a) of such Act.
short_title: Age Discrimination in Employment Amendments of 1979

summary.text: Age Discrimination in Employment Amendments of 1979 - Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to eliminate the upper age limitation of 70 years of age.

titles.title: Age Discrimination in Employment Amendments of 1979
A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to eliminate the upper age limitation of 70 years of age established in section 12(a) of such Act.
